text: Food and the ambience was nice, i ordered soto and the sambal kicap that comes with it gives a balance level of pedas üòã Ordered their strawberry latte, pun sedap. A perfect balance of sweetness and bitterness. Staffs are all very friendly and efficient. Toilet is clean. Overall definitely would come again ‚ú®

We came across Rumi Place on social media when we were looking for a dinner place, and happened to stumble across this gem for dinner! üòç the food, beverage & environment was amazing! had a chance to converse with the staff when we were leaving and they were really friendly! Do give this cafe a try if you're in Johor! Would definitely come back again for the good coffee & vibes ‚ú®

Nice place. Came here quite early and we are the first in. Ordered the burger and others. Good portion as well. Good food, good service, good atmosphere. What else? Love this place. Will come again for sure.

Was in the area for a work trip. Group of 6. My colleague found this cafe on Google with good reviews so we decided to try. So glad we came! The food was excellent, the decor is very quaint, love the music and ambience. When we come back for our site visits, we will definitely come again! üòä
